text:
Gov. Abbott, DSHS distribute antiviral drug Remdesivir in Lubbock to treat COVID-19.

This is being distributed to hospitals across the state.

More drugs to treat #COVID19 will be added in coming months.

#txlege

https://t.co/6pwcGuW8sN
